attributes.action: Stop the U.K Government from forcing the ‘Great Reset’ on the British public
attributes.additional_details:
The Great Reset will change the fundamental way that we all live our lives. One of the World Economic Forum’s tag line is “you will own nothing and you will be happy”.

Nobody agreed to let Klauss Schwabb dictate how we would live nor how we would feel about giving up our possessions.
attributes.background: The Government should not be able to lead the country down a route that will significantly change all of our lives without consulting the nation about it and then allowing us to vote for or against it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The UK Government and Parliament haven't adopted 'the Great Reset'. It's not clear from your petition what specific things you would like Government to commit not to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
